messages.subject: Maverick!
messages.msgSnippet: I LIKE IT! What a wonderful way to refer to oneself! God bless Vivian Mom to three Happy little Monkeys Austin 10/31/93 Sarah 8/28/95 Emmalee 8/15/00 And
messages.messageBody:
I LIKE IT! What a wonderful way to refer to oneself!
God bless
Vivian
Mom to three Happy little Monkeys
Austin 10/31/93 Sarah 8/28/95 Emmalee 8/15/00
And loving wife to Randy

**If fifty million people say a foolish thing, it is still a foolish thing.
-Anatole France***


----- Original Message -----
From: Cindy
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, March 21, 2002 4:29 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Unschooling or not?




Lynda wrote:
>
> Hey, if folks are comfy being labeled and thus limited in the eyes of
> others, go for it.
>

I have a label - it's one I proudly use : maverick. Definition :
an unorthodox or independent-minded person. I'm a quilting maverick,
I'm a homeschooling maverick and I'm definitely a housekeeping maverick!
I don't think this one limis me much!<g>

--

Cindy Ferguson
